title: On the Java Road
body:
I'm spending this week mostly doing customer visits. I've visited Delta Airlines, Home Depot, Equifax and Cingular so far. They all have large and wonderful development organizations who have put together some impressive Java apps. I also spent an evening with the Atlanta Java Users Group, doing non-stop Q&A. Atlanta has some great IT operations. Tomorrow I'm heading off to Memphis to visit some folks at FedEx.

Next week: TechDays, Beijing!
